description.value: Strategies in handling economic crises related to natural resources and human capital management in several rural areas of Indonesia.

notes.value:
Originally presented as the author's thesis (Ph. D.--Universitas Gadjah Mada and Utrecht University) under title: Pengelolaan sumberdaya perdesaan dan strategi penghidupan rumahtangga di Provinsi Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta pada masa krisis, 1998-2003.

Includes bibliographical references (p. 283-302).
